product.name: Flash Furniture 22'' x 22'' Restaurant Table X-Base with 3'' Dia. Bar Height Column
product.description: Get the look you want in your restaurant, break room or cafeteria with table bases and coordinating table tops. This table height base features cast iron construction designed for commercial use so you can be assured it will withstand the daily rigors in the hospitality industry. The black powder coated finish of the base easily matches any bar or restaurant decor. Whether you are just starting your business or upgrading your furniture, invest wisely with this table base designed to withstand years of heavy use.
product.bullet_points:
• Customize the look of your business and create your ideal setting with this cast iron table base. Add round and square table tops to give your space depth and balance. This table base will withstand years of use and is a perfect choice for commercial use
• X-base cast iron construction, easy 2 piece assembly with single bolt, black powder coated finish
• Top plate pre-welded to column, Top plate size: 9.375" Wide x 13.25" Diagonally, Screw-in adjustable floor glides
• Contemporary table base recommended for 24" to 30" round and square table tops
• PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 22"W x 22"D x 42"H
• Ships in several boxes, may ship separately
